channel.title: (FIXED) Need to be close to object to use it

item.title: (FIXED) Need to be close to object to use it
item.dc:creator: @Mmm1 Mmm.
item.description:
@Mmm1 wrote:

Why does the below not work? You can open the door anywhere but I don’t want it to:

if (objectX - absX <= 2 || objectX - absX >= -2 && objectY - absY <= 2 || objectY - absY >= -2) {
if(objectX == 3243 && objectY == 3450) {
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID, -4);
ReplaceObject(objectX-1,objectY,objectID, -1);
}
} else {
sendMessage("You have to be closer to do that!");
}

EDIT: Fixed, I forgot to change the “||” to “&&”.

Read full topic
item.source: (FIXED) Need to be close to object to use it
